name: Ichiban sushi and cajun harbor
address: 2-33 Beach 20th St, Far Rockaway, NY 11691, USA

reviews.text: Amazing food with lots of flavor, one of my favorite places to eat very beautiful and clean, I love sushi and bubble teas and theirs never disappoint always satisfying and tasty they are really nice and great customer service.

Disgusting & unprofessional experience

I came back because my order was wrong, and instead of replacing it properly, the employee took food out of my plate with his hands and gave it back to me. That is completely unsanitary and unacceptable. When I went back again, they were rude, though they eventually refunded me. This is completely unsanitary and unacceptable for any restaurant. You can see in the picture where my fries are missing from
The side and the top!! I did not touch them this how they gave it to me. DISGUSTING And the man in the picture is the one who took my fries out with his hands and gave it back to me.

I will never eat here again, and Iâ€™m reporting this to the health department!!

The food and everything was amazing and the staff were great. However, I saw a roach on the counter and the cashier was acting really casual about that - as if that's something that happens frequently. That was disgusting. Check your food if you dare to go there.
Not sure if the person who usually makes the sushi changed but itâ€™s not as good as it used to be and I buy from here religiously just wonâ€™t be buying the sushi anymore
I just love it here 10/10 I recommend
This place is gem
ramen is absolutely delicious here.
I bought a chicken bento box and there is barley in chicken in it and I paid 14.14 other places pile up on the chicken it tastes good but the give less chicken over here

This place does not sell fresh sushi, everytime I get sushi here, the rice taste and feels stale. The sushi roll itself with the fish or salmon inside, does not smell fresh. Once you open the package it comes in you can already smell the nasty smell out of it. I do not recommend this place at all. Go somewhere else.
Shrimp and catfish was fried to perfection the boba drinks was tasty the staff members are polite and friendly prices are reasonable
Amazing! I put in my order and they made it so quick and it was so delicious. Whenever Iâ€™m working (Emt btw) and by the area I come here to get my usual! Never fails in satisfying my cravings!
Great place to get seafood boil after a nice beach time. Would definitely come back again!

I ordered 3 snow crab seafood boils and a little 1/5 lb shrimp boil. The portions were great. My wife was missing her corn, and the medium spice level was in fact fire. Order mild if you're one of those that only likes a little spice.
They still look like a decent place where I would go back and try other things like the sushi rolls and boba teas.
I got sick from eating there seafood. I had a stomach virus for almost a week.  I would never eat from this restaurant again.
Oh my god, I love the boba so much, and the sushi, matter of fact, the whole restaurant atp so great and amazing ğŸ’”ğŸ’•

Listen... my son and I happened to walk in here last week.. ordered a nice seafood boil with some Dungeness crabs and 2 bubble teas.. we took our food to go and I'm glad we did cause the space is small and I wanted to eat in peace.. I've ordered delivery and physically gone back in twice since then so yes the food is good. S.b take the strawberry bubble tea add the pineapple jellies take it home and add some Dusse.. thank me later
I've been eating from this establishment on and off for over 6 months. The food is very good. Front staff is always professional and courteous.
The food not ready at time
Delicious sushi The seafood is very fresh, nutritious, and plentiful. I highly recommend this restaurant!
Put in a party tray 3 days in advance and they only started making the order when I came to pick up the order. Bad service. Had to wait 30 mins
Ordered sushi party tray and lots of takoyakis for work event. It was tasty and everyone loved it.

I have always ordered from here, and it was great. However, today we placed a large order, and it was very disappointing. Almost every roll had a crunchy, bread-like texture and tasted like it was cooked in burnt, old oil. They tasted atrocious, leaving a bitter aftertaste that lingered in my mouth.

Unfortunately, all good things come to an end. This place has lost its appeal for me. I won't be returning.
I have never had an issue with them, the place is clean food is fresh, prices are great, and the customer service is on point.

I ordered wings & fries & maybe thatâ€™s my mistake - ordering those items from a place that specializes in seafood/sushi however the good reviews made me want to try. When I tell you both the wings & fries were SO oily I barely tasted the flavor of the food.
I love the selection, and the variety. Friendly staff, fast service and fresh food. Recommend the  King Kong roll and the spicy kani roll.
I love love love this spot. Very clean, friendly staff, amazing food. Overall a 10/10 everytime!
delicious black milk tea with tapioca, takoyaki, & any 3 rolls spicy salmon/salmon/salmon avocado. would come back here!
Great crab cakes and chicken strips
I love their sushi rolls! So fresh and authentic tasting for sure ğŸ‘ğŸ½
Fresh And Delicious Sushi

I came in for seafood boil and it was very delicious and tasty I will definitely recommend it and the teriyaki chicken and lemon pepper wings very tasty and also has good variety of boba milk tea and fruit tea
Seafood Boils are always on point! Food is fresh and delicious. We eat from here at least once a month.

Delicious and affordable! The staff were very polite. Their takoyaki balls were great! I didnâ€™t like the chicken teriyaki because it was bland. The spicy tuna roll wasnâ€™t spicy at all. Otherwise, great food and boba.(The taro is my favorite) I will be a regular customer here!
Good
I love the sushi. The tiger roll and boba was really good.
The food is delicious and fresh with reasonable price.  No.1 place for Cajun harbor and Japanese food. Highly recommend.
This place is an amazimg outlet
Loving this place! Nice people, everything is fresh and testy. They also have bubble tea, and it is great. This place is gonna be my new spot for the bubble tea!!:)
Great place, Delicious food and reasonably priced

The boil is salty asffff the food wouldâ€™ve been good if it wasnâ€™t so damn salty !!!!! Thereâ€™s a difference between well seasoned and salty, this taste like straight up salt drink a gallon of water if you get this smh
